channel.title: GitHub on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Some Title

item.title: For beginners of SageMaker-Document link collection-
item.description: SageMaker, a machine learning management service of AWS, does not come out with pinpoint points, so I will summarize it. Amazon SageMaker features When operating the ML system in the production environment, the managed function is really effective. A component for realizing MLops and MDLC. The true benefit cannot be obtained only by developing the PoC model. Official reference Machine Learning Lens, AWS Well-Architected Framework https://d1.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/architecture/wellarchitected-Machine-Learning-Lens.pdf Guidelines for ML systems built on AWS

item.title: Get pull request info by calling github api with python
item.description: #Background I want to create a function that automatically notifies me when there is a schema change in the repository of the service that is the data source of the data infrastructure. I made it by pulling the Pull Request information with github api, so a memo at that time. Authentication uses a personal access token â†“ Create a personal access token for the command line Implementation import requests #Get only PR that has been closed URL ='https://api.

item.title: Jupyter Learning Note_005
item.description: ## How to clone GitHub repository to [google colab](https://colab.research.google.com/) Follow the steps below. mount google drive from google.colab import drive drive.mount('/content/drive') create a repository in the location specified by git clone import shutil import os # Change current directory os.chdir('/content/drive/My Drive') cur_dir = os.getcwd() git_name ='/MongoDB_PyMongo_Tutorial' git_folder = cur_dir + git_name #Delete if it exists if os.path.exists(git_folder): shutil.rmtree(git_folder) #Clone !git clone https://github.com/Giffy/MongoDB_PyMongo_Tutorial.git Implementation result
